questions.question: countryLabel
questions.sparqlQuery:
select distinct ?country ?[QUESTION] ?capital ?[ANSWER] where {
  ?country wdt:P31 wd:Q6256 .
  ?capital wdt:P31 wd:Q5119 .
  ?country wdt:P36 ?capital .
  ?country rdfs:label ?countryLabel .
  ?capital rdfs:label ?capitalLabel .
  FILTER(LANG(?countryLabel)="[LANGUAGE]" && LANG(?capitalLabel)="[LANGUAGE]")
  }

questions.question: countryLabel
questions.sparqlQuery:
select distinct ?country ?[QUESTION] ?currency ?[ANSWER] where {
  ?country wdt:P31 wd:Q6256 .
  ?currency wdt:P31 wd:Q8142 .
  ?country wdt:P38 ?currency .
  ?country rdfs:label ?countryLabel .
  ?currency rdfs:label ?currencyLabel .
  FILTER NOT EXISTS {?country wdt:P31 wd:Q3024240} .
  FILTER(LANG(?countryLabel)="[LANGUAGE]" && LANG(?currencyLabel)="[LANGUAGE]")
  }
